title: Google shares rise on report of Apple using Gemini for Siri
text: Alphabet shares rose 3% on a Friday report that Apple is in talks to incorporate Gemini technology for a revamped version of Siri, Apple's voice assistant. The talks come as the two tech giants face an uncertain future as its deals for search placement is at risk pending a regulation decision.

title: Apple May Use Google Gemini AI to Power Revamped Siri
text: Apple is in early discussions about using Google Gemini to power a revamped version of its Siri voice assistant. The work is part of an effort to catch up in generative AI, a field where the company arrived late and then struggled to gain traction.
